articles.author: Harry Poole
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Elena Rybakina beats Aryna Sabalenka to win women's singles title - BBC
articles.description: Elena Rybakina inflicts further Grand Slam final heartbreak on Aryna Sabalenka with a stunning third-set fightback to win the Australian Open.
articles.content:
The final set aside, both players were dominant on serve, with only three of the first 19 games featuring break point opportunities.
Rybakina made her intentions clear with an immediate break on Rod… [+1535 chars]
